rating_comment: Would recommend this place, make sure you ask if you need anything. I felt really well looked after and they accommodated my time requirements

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2017
rating_comment: Jahirul is an extremely friendly person. The day I planned to come to Bangladesh, he extended all his support to me. He regularly communicated with me and helped me to make plans accordingly. When I landed in Dhaka, he recieved me with a warm welcome. I completely felt that I was speaking to an old friend. Jahirul made me familiar with the city and told me the directions to the tourist attractions. The room was clean and tidy. It was a total value for money experience. The security guard of the building is extremely friendly and and we shared many friendly conversations. I highly recommend the guest to stay at this accommodation, it's safe, clean and pocket friendly. This was my first AirBNB experience and I loved it.

rating_comment: It was very friendly and the service was good.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2016,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Great host, good room and very helpful! I recommend staying with Jahirul in Uttara

connected you can easily commute around the city.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2016
rating_comment: Liked the room very much.It is in a residential area.Utility stores,restaurants,ATMs etc. are nearby.The host was in constant touch;he was very helpful.Would definitely stay here again!!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2016,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: 房主很nice and helpful ,给我换了一个big room instead of the smaller one that is enough for two persons.The facilities are enough to make me satisfied.唯一遗憾是没有空调，夏天会possibly too hot.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2016,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Originally I had a booking with another tenant but only one day before my trip, we found out that Airbnb gave confirmation without knowledge of tenant, and tenant was actually unable to accommodate me. Frantically searching for a replacement last minute, I came across Mr Jahirul's and he saved me! It was my first trip to Bangladesh and being first time I was kind of worried, but Mr Jahirul was very accommodating and responsive - the two most important criteria that we all need. His place was really clean and comfortable. To get to this place which is easily nearby the airport (north of Dhaka city), you would need to use a taxi (as like how you need to get around to anywhere in Dhaka). I didn't get to meet Mr Jahirul, but Mr Mamun was equally helpful and friendly! I would highly recommend this place to everyone!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2016,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: I could have great stay with the host and his great members. Really appreciate it and obviously want to visit here again. Actually I booked the room suddenly just day before my stay but there welcomed to me and gave me special treatment. Even in busy season Mamun who is host's brother took me around the city. Highly recommend you guys if you see really life in Dhaka!

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · April 2016,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Thank you for welcoming me to your place, Jahirul and Mamum!
For those who are reading the reviews, this place is far from the center of Dhaka, but near from the airport. There are a store where you can buy food and beverages and a pharmacy nearby so you would never have difficulties getting what you might need during your stay. The best part is that hosts are very kind and nice. They are gonna take care of you when you need help. Your days in Bangladesh would be absolutely awesome with them!

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · March 2016,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Clean and totally worth the price you pay. Recommend to anyone who wants to stay near the airport

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2016,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Mr Jahirul and Mr Mamun are the quintessential ambassadors for Bangladesh and were simply indispensable for creating memories for me that will last a lifetime. What I got by staying here wasn't so much a place to stay, which there were no problems with, but rather someone to help me make my trip a success so that I leave Bangladesh with a very favorable impression. And the mission was definitely accomplished on that front. One thing to note for anyone that will stay here is that the location of the apartment is far from Old Dhaka, but is very close to the airport. If you are curious about Bangladesh and want to explore the country, staying here is a great way to start. These gentleman will help you cobble together your itinerary, and assist with getting bus tickets and being at the right place at the right time. Nearby the apartment is a grocery store, several restaurants (the staff got to know me by name at one of them), and even a spa within 15 minutes of walking.

Mamun helped me to visit places in Dhaka, which I wanted. Truly I would not be able to get there without his help. home convenient for me.

I enjoyed for two weeks in Dhaka. Host have a kindness and hospitality. Host's brother Mamun takes me around Dhaka city and teach me anything. Air conditioning and bed is good too.
However there are one disadvantage,far away from center of the Dhaka,it takes at least 2hours to there. In two weeks, I enjoyed so much and Host is so good. If I go there again I will stay same room again. this room is great.

rating_comment: Five-star hospitality at a hostel price. I really enjoyed Jahirul and Mamum's company and help during my stay in Uttara. Ended up prolonging the stay by a week! All in all, a great experience.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2015,  · Stayed one night

Jahirul even picked me up from the airport when I arrived at 3am. He gave good advice and especially his cousin Mamoun who helped me a lot in my travels to Dhaka.
Jahirul even came to pick me up at the airport though I arrived at 3 am. He was of good help and even more his cossin Mamun who helped me a lot in my first step in Dhaka.
